title: Car Yard Cleaning Service
shortDesc: Our car yard cleaning service is by far our most popular service! ...
description:
During the allocated days a team of highly experienced car yard hands will come in and:

  • Thoroughly house each vehicle
  • Clean each vehicle with a chamois


This will leave your yard looking great!
descriptionTwo:
During the allocated days a team of highly experienced car yard hands will come in and:

  • Thoroughly house each vehicle
  • Clean each vehicle with a chamois


This will leave your yard looking great!

title: Car Yard Soaping Service
shortDesc: Perfect for sales or if your yard has been left neglected for a while!..
description:
Perfect for sales or if your yard has been left neglected for a while!

A team of highly trained detailers will:

  • Thoroughly house each vehicle
  • Will soap the vehicle using a high end soaping/wax compound (perfect for removing pollen and dirt)
  • Will hose the vehicle again to remove soaping suds
  • Finish off with a Chamois service

This service can be organised into your yards cleaning protocol in a weekly, fortnightly, monthly oron a request basis.

This will make your yard look brand new!
descriptionTwo:
Perfect for sales or if your yard has been left neglected for a while!

title: Car Yard Tyre Service - Alloys
shortDesc: Nobody likes buying a car with dirty tyres, let us solve the problem! ...
description:
Nobody likes buying a car with dirty tyres, let us solve the problem!

A team of highly trained detailers will:

  • Utilising microfibres and a chamois we will go around to each alloy on the yard and clean of all the brake dust and grime.
  • This service can be organised into your yards cleaning protocol in a weekly, fortnightly, monthly or on a request basis.

Perfect to give your yard that completed look!
descriptionTwo:
Nobody likes buying a car with dirty tyres, let us solve the problem!

A team of highly trained detailers will:

  • Utilising microfibres and a chamois we will go around to each alloy on the yard and clean of all the brake dust and grime.
  • This service can be organised into your yards cleaning protocol in a weekly, fortnightly, monthly or on a request basis.

Perfect to give your yard that completed look!

title: Car Yard Tyre Service – Tyre Shine
titleTwo: Car Yard Tyre Service – Tyre Shine
shortDesc: The best way to make your yard stand out! ...
description:
The best way to make your yard stand out!

A team of highly trained detailers will:

  • Coat the wheels on yard with a superior tyre shine product. Being a silicone-based product, it has a strong adhesive quality. This will keep the tyres looking shiny for longer!

This service can be organised into your yards cleaning protocol in a weekly, fortnightly, monthly or on a request basis.

title: Car Detailing Service
shortDesc: Need some experienced detailers to help out your staff? End of month quotas caused a chaos?...
description:
Need some experienced detailers to help out your staff? End of month quotas caused a chaos? Let us help you out!

Our detailers are trained in high quality details and are perfect for preparing vehicles for customer collection. Many of our detailers are experienced in paint protections and cut and polishing. Essential skills for those aftermarket product applications.

Whether you need one of our detailers to assist your current detailing team or would like one of our mobile detailers to come and handle those extra few cars, we can provide the solution you need.
